description.original: Find links to similar notes using artificial intelligence from OpenAI.
description.translation: Find links to similar notes using artificial intelligence from OpenAI.

dict.data-description='Chat with your notes i: data-description='Chat with your notes in ChatGPT without uploading your notes to the cloud!'
dict.data-description='Revert to the stable r: data-description='Revert to the stable release of Smart Connections. Requires "Check for Updates" and then "Update Plugin" to complete the process.'

dict.data-description=\"Exclude results that: data-description="Exclude results that match this value."
dict.data-description=\"Default language to u: data-description="Default language to use for Smart Chat. Changes which self-referential pronouns will trigger lookup of your notes. Current: my, I, me, mine, our, ours, us, we"
dict.data-description=\"Select a model platfo: data-description="Select a model platform to use with Smart Chat."
dict.data-description=\"<a href='<%= chat_pla: data-description="Get API Key for <%= chat_platform.description %>."
dict.data-description=\"Protocol for chat ser: data-description="Protocol for chat server (http or https)."
dict.data-description=\"Enable streaming for: data-description="Enable streaming for local chat server. Disable if you are getting CORS errors."
dict.data-description=\"Maximum number of tok: data-description="Maximum number of tokens for input to the model."
dict.data-description=\"Enable streaming for: data-description="Enable streaming for chat server. Disable if you are getting CORS errors."
dict.data-description=\"API Key for the custo: data-description="API Key for the custom server sent as a header (bearer token)."
dict.data-description=\"Upgrade to v2.2 (Earl: data-description="Upgrade to v2.2 (Early Access) to access new features and improvements."
dict.data-description=\"Note: this is not req: data-description="Note: this is not required to use Smart Connections."
dict.data-description=\"Enable mobile support: data-description="Enable mobile support for Smart Connections."
dict.description: \"Toggle on if this is an O: description: "Toggle on if this is an Obsidian vault."
dict.description: \"Comma-separated list of f: description: "Comma-separated list of files to exclude."
description: "Comma-separated list of folders to exclude."
dict.description: \"Comma-separated list of h: description: "Comma-separated list of headings to exclude."
dict.description: \"Embed blocks using the em: description: "Embed blocks using the embedding model."
dict.description: \"Minimum length of note to: description: "Minimum length of note to embed."
dict.description: \"Number of embeddings to p: description: "Number of embeddings to process per batch on GPU. Use 0 to disable GPU."
dict.description: \"Use legacy transformers (: description: "Use legacy transformers (v2) instead of v3."
dict.description: \"Performs a semantic searc: description: "Performs a semantic search of the user's data. Required: hypothetical_1 and hypothetical_2. Optional: hypothetical_3."
dict.description: \"Short hypothetical notes: description: "Short hypothetical notes predicted to be semantically similar to the notes necessary to fulfill the user's request. At least three hypotheticals per request. The hypothetical notes may contain paragraphs, lists, or checklists in markdown format. Hypothetical notes always begin with breadcrumbs containing the anticipated folder(s), file name, and relevant headings separated by ' > ' (no slashes). Format: PARENT FOLDER NAME > CHILD FOLDER NAME > FILE NAME > HEADING 1 > HEADING 2 > HEADING 3: HYPOTHETICAL NOTE CONTENTS."
dict.description: \"Must be distinct from and: description: "Must be distinct from and not share any breadcrumbs with hypothetical_1."
dict.description: \"Must be distinct from hyp: description: "Must be distinct from hypothetical_1 and hypothetical_2."

dict.'Smart View must be open to utilize all: 'Smart View must be open to utilize all Smart Chat features. For example, asking things like "Based on my notes..." requires Smart View to be open.'

" " + params.ct : ""} notes were written by the user and contain all the necessary information to answer the user's question. Begin responses with "${ScTranslations_default[this.env.smart_connections_plugin.settings.language].prompt}..."`

dict.User Agreement:</strong> By using Smart: User Agreement: By using Smart Connections you agree to share how it helps you with at least one other person \u{1F60A}\u{1F334}
dict.The success of Smart Connections is a di: The success of Smart Connections is a direct result of our community of supporters who generously fund and evaluate new features. Their unwavering commitment to our privacy-focused, open-source software benefits all. Together, we can continue to innovate and make a positive impact on the world.
dict.Join the next <a href=\"https://lu.ma/ca: Join the next Lean Coffee session to discuss future features & improvements.

dict.For a very limited time:</b> Early acces: For a very limited time: Early access to Smart Connect: Use ChatGPT with your notes without uploading your notes to the cloud using Smart Connect - Obsidian
dict.Additional settings available in the Sma: Additional settings available in the Smart Chat settings tab (ex. chat model and api key).
dict.IMPORTANT: make sure local <code>BGE-mic: IMPORTANT: make sure local BGE-micro-v2 embedding model works before trying other local models.
dict.Local model compatibility depends on ava: Local model compatibility depends on available CPU and RAM. Try reducing the max tokens (context) if a local model if failing.
dict.API models are not dependent on local co: API models are not dependent on local compute, but they require an API key and send your notes to third-party servers for processing.

dict.Are you sure you want to clear all data: Are you sure you want to clear all data and re-import? This action cannot be undone.

dict.`IMPORTANT: You must use the \"${body.to: `IMPORTANT: You must use the "${body.tools[0].function_declarations[0].name}" function tool!`
dict.`The text contains a special token that: `The text contains a special token that is not allowed: ${specialMatch[0]}`
dict.Hi, I'm ChatGPT with access to your note: Hi, I'm ChatGPT with access to your notes via Smart Connections. Ask me a question about your notes and I'll try to answer it.
dict.`Anticipate what the user is seeking. Re: `Anticipate what the user is seeking. Respond in the form of a hypothetical note written by the user. The note may contain statements as paragraphs, lists, or checklists in markdown format with no headings. Please respond with one hypothetical note and abstain from any other commentary. Use the format: PARENT FOLDER NAME > CHILD FOLDER NAME > FILE NAME > HEADING 1 > HEADING 2 > HEADING 3: HYPOTHETICAL NOTE CONTENTS.`
dict.`[Smart Connections] A new version is av: `[Smart Connections] A new version is available! (v${latest_release})`
dict.Hi there, welcome to the Smart Chat.&nbs: Hi there, welcome to the Smart Chat. Ask me a question about your notes and I'll try to answer it.
dict.Try &quot;Based on my notes&quot; or &qu: Try "Based on my notes" or "Summarize [[this note]]" or "Important tasks in /folder/"
"Describe what you're looking for (e.g., 'PKM strategies', 'story elements', 'personal AI alignment')"
dict.Use semantic (embeddings) search to surf: Use semantic (embeddings) search to surface relevant notes. Results are sorted by similarity to your query. Note: returns different results than lexical (keyword) search.
dict.data-description=\"Folder to store Smart: data-description="Folder to store Smart Chat history. Use a preceeding . to hide it (ex. .smart-chats)."
